reviewText: Been looking for blu Ray for region 1(a)
I can't watch it my DVD blue ray can't play it.

A  sadly, mostly forgotten gem of a movie. So much so, that the only place I could source it on Blu-ray is Germany, ostensibly from DVDs From Germany, who despatched it very quickly. It  looks and sounds very good on Blu-ray and the great songs featured through the movie sound very much alive. The 5.1 dts sound mix gives added depth & realism to crowd & party scenes. The extra footage is not superfluous either. Good product & good service from DVDs From Germany.
